definition: clamor/noise/(bound form) sound used to call cats
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat

sentences.english: The tears are just like raindrops.
sentences.chinese: 哗啦啦，小白云的眼泪像雨点。

sentences.english: She took up a sheet and ratcheted it into the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起一张纸，把它哗哗啦啦地塞到打字机中。

sentences.english: The rain was pouring through a hole in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 雨水从房顶的漏洞哗啦啦地流了进来。

sentences.english: The three clung to their seats as bags cascaded down from the luggage racks.
sentences.chinese: 三个人紧紧抓住座位，包从行李架上哗啦啦落下来。

sentences.english: The angry elephant crashed through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 那头愤怒的大象哗哗啦啦地跑过这片森林。

sentences.english: The rain is pouring in lance-like showers.
sentences.chinese: 大雨哗啦啦下着，喷水枪似的。

sentences.english: A flag on the top of the house stirred loudly in the strong wind.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶上的一面旗子在狂风中哗哗啦啦地抖个不停。

sentences.english: The anchor was instantly dropped, and the chain ran rattling through the port-hole.
sentences.chinese: 锚立刻抛下去了，铁链哗啦啦一阵响声过去。

sentences.english: A stream of water went brattling.
Going, and they all climbed up the apple tree.
sentences.chinese: 哗啦啦，他们全爬上了苹果树。

sentences.english: The tree fell with a great crash.
sentences.chinese: 那树哗啦啦一声倒下来。

sentences.english: The rocks crashed down on to the road below.
sentences.chinese: 岩石哗啦啦滚落到下面的公路上。

definition: (onom.) sound of a crash/with a crash
with a crash/with a thunderous noise
clamor/noise/(bound form) sound used to call cats
variant of 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]
very slight sound/rustling (onom.)/to stream down (of tears)/luxuriant growth (of vegetation)
see 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
